content: The latest ig publisher does not run in GUI mode (at least on Windows - nothing happens, no errors either, just doesn't open). The 1.8.0 igpublisher does. The latest does run in command line mode, so I don't have an urgent issue, just reporting.
hm. @James Agnew this is a java thing - I can reproduce it, but don't know how to fix it - the main thread terminates without waiting for the gui. But I haven't changed that code
Is it pretty quick to fail? Could be a good case for git bisect
